forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow developing during the afternoon. High around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy. Snow likely in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low -1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 31F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later in the day. High 39F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers around in the evening, otherwise mostly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a few snow showers in the evening. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High around 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Temps nearly steady around 30. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow flurries and snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
